body: South Korean net users commemorated the death of Choi Go-eun, a movie writer who died from chronic disease after battling with the poverty and huger with earning less than minimum wage, around 600 USD a year. The Federation of Movie Worker’s Union defined her death[ko] a 'social murder' and criticized the rampant injustice in movie industry.
original_body: South Korean net users commemorated the death of Choi Go-eun, a movie writer who died from chronic disease after battling with the poverty and huger with earning less than minimum wage, around 600 USD a year. The Federation of Movie Worker’s Union defined her death[ko] a 'social murder' and criticized the rampant injustice in movie industry.
title: S.Korean net users mourn over the death of a struggling movie writer
